comments.en:
Multifunction printer-scanner-fax-copier. Printing and scanning work, faxing from the PC not.

For basic printing functionality use the Postscript PPD. For advanced functionality such as printer status, maintenance features, scanning and photo card unload use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

Stand-alone copying should just work, it does not need the PC.

Consumables/Refills: refill cartridge ~60 USD
